attributes.action: sack all those involved in baby p case, review the social services system, jail the 3 people for life.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: baby p and all the other children need justice.....i think its an utter disgrace that this has been allowed to happen yet again another childs life gone because of the incompetence of those involved in his case the doctors. the social workers and everyone else should be sacked with immediate effect and all 3 adults involved should be charged with murder .. and the system and the way these matters are delt with has to change quickly . children should be protected by these people in the authorities and im affraid to say they are not ... please help bring justice

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
